pl.touk.hades.sql.timemonitoring
Class SqlTimeBasedQuartzMonitor

java.lang.Object
  pl.touk.hades.sql.timemonitoring.SqlTimeBasedQuartzMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionListener, Monitor, SqlTimeBasedMonitor
public final class SqlTimeBasedQuartzMonitor
extends Object
implements SqlTimeBasedMonitor

Monitor that usesTrigger that activates failover when the main data source is overloaded in comparison to the failover data source.

Author:
Michal Sokolowski
